p: On August 31, 2015, local public health authorities were informed about an outbreak of ARI among young students at a training base located in the Daxing District of Beijing. The training base consisted of two three-floor buildings for teaching and three three-floor dormitories with eight persons to a room. The training base recruits only male middle school graduates. Approximately 3000 students majoring in Mathematics, Chinese, and English were enrolled in a total of sixty classes. The training base employs 100 full-time staff members.
